alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 14 at 3:28AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.7 to 4.9 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Nantucket MA County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...only minor inundation and erosion is expected around the time of high tide early Wednesday morning. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/06 PM 3.4/ 3.9 -0.2/ 0.2 0.9/ 1.4 5-6 None 14/06 AM 4.6/ 5.1 1.0/ 1.5 1.4/ 1.9 8-9 Minor 14/06 PM 3.0/ 3.5 -0.7/-0.2 0.6/ 1.1 8 None 15/06 AM 5.0/ 5.5 1.4/ 1.9 1.8/ 2.2 6-7 Minor 15/07 PM 3.1/ 3.6 -0.6/-0.1 0.8/ 1.3 5 None 16/07 AM 4.5/ 5.0 0.9/ 1.4 1.2/ 1.7 4-5 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
